record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, the Senate will now proceed to a period for the transaction for morning business until 3:30 p.m. with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each, and the Senator from North Dakota, Mr. Dorgan, in control of 45 minutes and the Senator from Pennsylvania, Mr. Specter, in control of 30 minutes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, Senator Dorgan and I have arranged to switch times. He graciously consented to that. I ask unanimous consent that I may proceed for the 30-minute special order that was already announced and that Senator Dorgan be recognized for 45 minutes when my time is concluded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
